verbose_text: We found that the acetylation and tyrosine phosphorylation levels of PKM2 did not change when TBC1D8 was ectopically expressed, suggesting that TBC1D8 dissociates tetrameric PKM2 to form dimers not by acetylating or tyrosine phosphorylating PKM2.
evidence: acetylation and tyrosine-phosphorylation levels of PKM2
